给已经存在的账号赋权限

2. 生成MySQL账号密码
===

## 1. 生成开发账号
```
GRANT SELECT,INSERT,DELETE,UPDATE ON `database.table` TO account_name@host IDENTIFIED BY "password";

GRANT SELECT,INSERT,UPDATE,DELETE ON anhao_development.* TO developer@'%' IDENTIFIED BY '5dyllT4vemA2Pad6vFd&gW4oL2Q-EwGs';

```
## 2. 给已经存在的账号添加权限
```
GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON anhao_four_develop.* TO developer@'%';
```

## 3. 刷新权限表
```
flush privileges;
```

account_name
GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON anhao_four_develop.* TO developer@'%';
GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON anhao_four_develop.* TO developer@'%';
GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON anhao_four_develop.* TO developer@'%';

2. 生成MySQL账号密码
===

## 1. 生成开发账号
```
GRANT SELECT,INSERT,DELETE,UPDATE ON `database.table` TO account_name@host IDENTIFIED BY "password";

GRANT SELECT,INSERT,UPDATE,DELETE ON anhao_development.* TO developer@'%' IDENTIFIED BY '5dyllT4vemA2Pad6vFd&gW4oL2Q-EwGs';

```
## 2. 给已经存在的账号添加权限
```
GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON anhao_four_develop.* TO developer@'%';
GRANT SELECT,INSERT,UPDATE,DELETE ON yuetan.* TO developer@'%';
```

## 3. 刷新权限表
```
flush privileges;
```

account_name
GRANT SELECT,INSERT,UPDATE,DELETE ON yuetan.* TO developer@'%';

show grants for 你的用户

show grants for root@'localhost';

drop user 用户名@’%’; 
drop user 用户名@ localhost;

CREATE TABLE `vinno_color_ultrasound` (
  `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'PK:ID',
  `exam_id` varchar(60) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '检查ID',
  `vinno_xml_url` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '彩超报告xml文件存储路径',
  `teminal_name` varchar(30) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '超声机名称',
  `accession_number` varchar(30) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '检索号（这个一般用户dicom worklist对接）',
  `template` varchar(30) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '报告模板名称',
  `title` varchar(30) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '报告标题',
  `idcard` char(18) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '身份证号(  病人ID )',
  `name` varchar(30) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '姓名',
  `gender` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0 未指定 1 男 2 女',
  `birthday` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00' COMMENT '生日日期',
  `age` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '年龄',
  `exam_date` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00' COMMENT '检查日期',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00' COMMENT '创建时间',
  `update_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00' COMMENT '更新时间',
  `description` text COMMENT '报告描述',
  `summary` text COMMENT '报告结论',
  `operator_physician` varchar(30) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '操作医生',
  `performing_physician` varchar(30) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '主治医生',
  `referring_physician` varchar(30) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '咨询医生',
  `digital_signature` varchar(30) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '数字签名',
  `gestational_age` tinyint(5) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '孕周（总天数）',
  `examine_type` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '彩超检查类型（预留字段）',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB  DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='飞依诺彩超数据表'

CREATE TABLE `vinno_images` (
  `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'PK:ID',
  `vinno_color_ultrasound_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '飞依诺彩超数据表主键id',
  `image_url` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '检查报告中对应的影像图片URL路径',
  `image_name` varchar(60) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '超声图像名称',
  `image_type` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0 未知 1 本地图像(Local) 2 产科图标(Ob)  3 测量工作表(WorkSheet) 4 远程图像(Remote) 5 数字签名(DigitalSignature)',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='飞依诺彩超影像图像表'

CREATE TABLE `vinno_images` (
  `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'PK:ID',
  `vinno_color_ultrasound_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '飞依诺彩超数据表主键id',
  `image_url` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '检查报告中对应的影像图片URL路径',
  `image_name` varchar(60) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '超声图像名称',
  `image_type` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0 未知 1 本地图像(Local) 2 产科图标(Ob)  3 测量工作表(WorkSheet) 4 远程图像(Remote) 5 数字签名(DigitalSignature)',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_vinno_color_ultrasound_id` (`vinno_color_ultrasound_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='飞依诺彩超影像图像表'
